message: Let's start with a fair split, we can negotiate from here!
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering the inflation that affects you more heavily. Let's see if we can agree on this!
You think a 60/40 split is fair now? I think you're trying to take advantage of the situation!
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up much more than the original 60/40 split. Meet me in the middle?
